tweet: Hey, this thing is quick!  I've already got some followers to chat with.
Only going to be in China about 5 more days, but until I return to the USA - my connection is very slow and I'm having a hard time following
But, I promise to give you my follow as soon as the connection speeds up.  I won't forget you!   ;-)
I'm getting quite a few followers. I'm going to have to start posting some content so we can start helping each other! More to come . . .
Working on a new version of my Web site. Used MS FrontPage before but it's just too much trouble.
